agency.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a business that provides a particular service for people or organizations
agency.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job
agency.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
agency.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a government department with a particular responsibility
agency.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a business that provides a particular service or provides information about other businesses and their products
agency.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Association Marketing Inc, an insurance agency and brokerage company
agency.translation[1].definitions[2].def: a business that represents a company in a particular area and sells its products
